articles.title: With Baylor Scheierman’s Transfer, Creighton Can Stake Claim for Preseason No. 1 - Sports Illustrated

articles.content: Baylor Scheierman, one of the most highly regarded names in the transfer portal, announced his commitment to Creighton on Wednesday. It’s a major addition to a Bluejays team that already had sky-high… [+3344 chars]
